classes.container: rounded shadow border border-gray-200 bg-white dark:(bg-dark-600 border-gray-600)

heading.container: flex items-center justify-start space-x-2 px-4 py-2
heading.title: text-base font-bold

rowCount.container: col-span-2 md:(col-span-1 justify-self-start) px-4 py-2 justify-self-center self-center
rowCount.label: text-sm mr-2
rowCount.select: pl-2 pr-8 text-sm rounded border-gray-200 dark:(bg-dark-600 border-gray-600)

pagination.groupBtn: rounded text-blue-400 mx-4 my-2 ring-2 inline-flex
pagination.pageBtn: w-8 h-8 flex items-center justify-center hover:(bg-blue-400 text-white)
